sentences.sentence: Firefighters were alerted early on Sunday morning to a blaze at a venue in the Atalaya district in the city of Murcia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They managed to put out the fire by 8 a.m., but ongoing search and rescue operations remain delicate, with the severely damaged building at risk of collapse.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Populist former Prime Minister Robert Fico and his leftist smur party have won Slovakia's parliamentary elections in what's widely seen as a victory for Vladimir Putin. After a campaign based on a pro-Russia, anti-American message, Smir led with 22.9 percent, the Slovak statistics office said on Sunday, after counting more than 99.9 percent of the vote. FICO's main rival Mikhail Simaker, whose progressive Slovakia party was a distant second at 18 percent, said Fico's win is bad news for the country and would be even worse if Smer manages to form a government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The country of 5.5 million people has been a staunch supporter of Ukraine since Russia's invasion last year, donating weapons and opening its borders to refugees fleeing the war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: FICO opposes EU sanctions on Russia and wants to block Ukraine from joining NATO.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Hundreds of thousands of opposition supporters marched through Warsaw on Sunday, just two weeks before a crucial parliamentary election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Opposition leader Donald Tusk, who was once the European Council president, is trying to get rid of the controversial nationalist government that's been eroding the rule of law.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: After it was found to be limiting the independence of its judges, the EU has been fining Poland half a million euros every day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The ruling Law and Justice Party has also interfered with state media to ensure it mostly promotes the government's views.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
